data.text: @ChannelNewsAsia Put some system into work, not just warning. Digital transformation?
@ChannelNewsAsia Slap on the hand or slap on own face? What kind of law is that?
@ChannelNewsAsia Sounded too good to be true with loop holes !

@ChannelNewsAsia the irony. how MOM has to suspend foreign work pass privileges in order to get some companies to stay in line with their advisory. how addictive cheap labour or preferred nationalities can have such an impact and not companies being socially responsible. CSR what?
@ChannelNewsAsia Useless MOM MOH OYK etc â€¦ hahaha
